description:
Crystal Saint is Cygnus Hyoga`s master in the anime adaptation, as opposed to the manga, in which Aquarius Camus was Hyouga`s master. In the anime, Camus was Crystal Saint`s master. His Cloth resembles a snowflake when not being worn. A very honorable and righteous Saint, he was considered a threat by Pope Ares, who forced him into his control with his Genrou Maouken technique. After an emotional battle with Hyouga, Crystal Saint takes his own life to stop Sanctuary from conquering East Siberia. 
Source: Saint Seiya Wikia
name: Crystal Saint
